action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two attacks, using Stone Club or Rock in any combination.

action.name: Stone Club
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Limited Foresight {@recharge}
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the cyclops can see makes an attack roll against it. {@actResponse} The cyclops imposes {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the roll, and the cyclops gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against the target until the end of the cyclops's next turn.
